actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the dollar limit on the amount of compensation which may be deferred under State and local government deferred compensation plans and to provide that amounts deferred under such plans shall be included in income only when paid.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $7,500 to $15,000 the amount of compensation which may be deferred under State and local government deferred compensation plans. Provides that amounts deferred under such plans shall be included in income only when paid.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the dollar limit on the amount of compensation which may be deferred under State and local government deferred compensation plans and to provide that amounts deferred under such plans shall be included in income only when paid.
